alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 07 at 6:16PM CDT until July 07 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of South Central Kansas, including the following county, Sedgwick. * WHEN...Until 1015 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 614 PM CDT, A strong storm producing very high rainfall rates is moving through Wichita and will likely cause flooding across the typical flood prone areas across the city. Be sure not to drive across water covered roadways. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Wichita, Derby, Andover, Haysville, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Goddard, Maize, Colwich, Downtown Wichita, Kechi, Andale, Eastborough, Eisenhower National Airport, West Wichita, South Wichita, East Wichita, Mcconnell Air Force Base and Northeast Wichita.
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown.
